other_tests.findings: Positive, dark stool initially; following GI evaluation, a large bowel movement with brown, guaiac-negative stool was noted.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Transition from guaiac positive dark stool to guaiac negative brown stool after the bowel movement.

other_tests.findings: Left adrenal nodule measuring 14 x 8 mm, several lesions in the kidneys, and mild distention of the gallbladder.
